item.name: Sharp SJ-X165MG Kulkas Shine Magneglas Series Red
item.description:
FEATURES

Body Color Black with Geometric pattern blue/red magneglas steel plate
Cooling System Direct Cooling
Refrigerant (NON CFC) R-134a
Defrosting Semi Automatic
CAPACITY
Capacity (Gross / Netto) 133 Liter / 128 Liter
Refrigerator (Gross / Netto) 113 Liter / 109 Liter
Freezer (Gross / Netto) 20 Liter / 19 Liter
POWER
Source 220 - 240 Volt
Consumption 84 Watt
DIMENSION (W X H X D)
Width 535 mm
Height 977 mm
Depth 575 mm
NET WEIGHT
Weight nett : 24 kg
